column1: It is important that our COVID restrictions are based on accurate data while protecting American’s mental health not frivolous emotional appeals. https://t.co/uWfKKBOQiD
COVID relief is long overdue for the American people. It’s time to put partisanship aside and pass legislation to save lives. https://t.co/LtkAddbPSz
As a part of the 35 House Republicans that requested a PPP funding bill be brought to the floor I am ashamed at Speaker Pelosi’s leadership throughout the COVID pandemic.  https://t.co/KY0OklaZzT
The American people deserve safety and privacy when it comes to our development of a COVID vaccine. We must be on high alert when it comes to foreign adversaries.  https://t.co/YbycZKzAkb

Just as the Senate is doing this week it’s essential Speaker Pelosi brings the House back to session to vote on additional funding that will support our Hoosier families who have been directly impacted by #COVID19.  https://t.co/V7kzR0FcVm
While our nation is still recovering COVID it is encouraging to see unemployment numbers continue to drop as our economy continues to come back.  https://t.co/cZpujO2DcC

American innovation is more important than ever and I’m proud to have introduced bipartisan legislation that will provide tax breaks to medial tech startups who have taken a hit from #COVID19.  https://t.co/LhoESHjP5C

Communist China has been stealing our research for decades – this is nothing new but the stakes are higher than ever. We must investigate China and the degree to which they are spying on our COVID-19 research. https://t.co/b2MCjY7sRL
